entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
